title: How to know when you know enough about something - Quora

response.answer_text: You can't... however if you are satisfied with your knowledge of a certain topic and have been provided with all the skills you require to complete your job or mission, then you may, without guilt, lay that topic aside and turn your attention to personal growth elsewhere.

When you have exposed yourself to a range of sources about the topic and have been able to come to a reasoned argument about it. Note: "reasoned argument" and "opinion" are not synonymous. And you should always be open to new information about your topic.
